So Odlulu uses the magical Haunted House Key to bring a few of the decorations to life.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep25
programme.desc: The Case Of The Torn-Out Pages - Someone's ripped out the final pages of Queen Sparklewings Fairytale book! Who could it be ? Noddy needs to find out fast and restore the pages to the book or the Queen's special fairytale storytelling will be cancelled.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep26
programme.desc: The Case Of The Bird That Can'T Fly - Noddy finds a bird in Pat-Pat's Treehouse that doesn't seem to be able to fly. He decides to investigate: how can they help the bird to fly? Noddy finds out that the bird can fly – it just doesn't want to. But why ?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep27
programme.desc: The Case Of The Clockwork Mouse Mystery - Everyone in Toyland is excited about the first ever Winter Light Festival - except its organiser, Clockwork Mouse who is moving at super fast speed. Noddy investigates why she's acting so strangely. He works out that she's been trying to move at triple speed to get everything sorted in time. Noddy helps her realise that she doesn't have to do all the festival preparations on her own. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep28
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Smartysaurus - For the Night of the Stars, Noddy invites all his friends at home to look at the stars through his telescope. Smartysaurus will bring a map of the stars so everyone can spot them. But when the party starts, Smartysaurus hasn't arrived. Noddy investigates and finds out his big friend couldn't fit through his small front door so she'd shrunk herself! Noddy has to help Smartysaurus get back to her proper size and find a way for everyone to enjoy the Night of the Stars together. Good job, Noddy.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep25
programme.desc: Clangy Bangy Crocky - Crocky has got his foot stuck in a bucket, which makes lots of noise every time he walks. It's great fun making lots of noise at first, but soon Crocky tires of the bucket stuck on his foot. How can Raa Raa and the other jungle animals help Crocky remove the bucket?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep26
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S New Noise - Raa Raa wants to find the perfect noise to partner his friend Huffty in a tune. He hears an amazing new noise but does not know what made it… he sets out on a noisy discovery to find out how to recreate this wonderful new noise.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep27
programme.desc: Crocky'S Wobbly Tooth - Crocky has got a wobbly tooth. He really wants it to fall out. He and his friends try all sorts of different ways to try and help the tooth fall out… will any of them work?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep28
programme.desc: Littlest Laugh - Raa Raa and Ooo Ooo are trying to find out who is the funniest animal in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. But they soon realise that they are much funnier when they are together.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep25
programme.desc: Home Is Where The Hatch Is - Breeze and Roary swap places for the day (and night). Roary soon discovers the beach is no place for a racing car to live, while Breeze misses the freedom of the beach.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep26
programme.desc: Putting On A Show - The cars are all gleaming for this evening's race. Roary gets bored and heads out onto the track - with disastrous consequences. Will the cars be ready in time for the big show?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep27
programme.desc: Motor Mouth - The track inspector is coming to visit and Big Chris is too tired to commentate on the race. A celebrity commentator is brought in to save the day - much to Big Chris' anger.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep28
programme.desc: Dancing Queen - Christine is due to take part in a dancing competition and is practising at Silver Hatch. But what happens when her dance partner is taken ill?

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep13
programme.desc: Fleshed Out / Messy Business At The Manor - Fleshed Out Wolfie wakes up one morning to every creature's nightmare?he's turned into a human! Messy Business At The Manor When Mosshead has nowhere to go for vacation, Casper invites him to stay at his uncles' house…where he quickly discovers that Mosshead is the world's worst houseguest.

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep14
programme.desc: Paramedic Paranormal / Back To Ghoul - Paramedic Paranormal When Jimmy breaks out in hives, Casper and his friends have no choice but to bring him to the human hospital. Back To Ghoul When Casper's uncles Stinky, Fatso and Stretch decide to go back to Scare School, Casper is thrilled.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep35
programme.desc: Maggotron/Love Hurts - Skid unleashes an evil robot on Turbotown and has to get rid of the monster himself; Turbo falls for and betroths a head-eating mantis princess.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Ep9
programme.desc: Lights Camera Crackridge / Karaoke Dokey - Archibald scores a job as a movie star's stunt double. Loy starts to lose it after getting a disappointing score on Archibald's karaoke video game.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep36
programme.desc: Halloween - Boss Baby uses the cover of Halloween Night to sneak into Bubeezee’s Headquarters to shut it all down. Tim covers for Boss by distracting Marisol with a night of trick or treating.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep35
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Ghastly Danger Of The Ghost Dentist - The pressure's on Harold and George to tell the scariest campfire story ever. Perhaps their tale of an ill-fated frontier dentist will do the trick.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep35
programme.desc: Tone Death - After the Riders save a Deathsong egg from the Dragon Hunters, they must take it back to Melody Island when the hatched baby won't stop crying.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep35
programme.desc: King Pickles - When Kid Pickles is feeling down on his birthday, Puss and Artephius create a magical scroll that names Kid Pickles as heir to the San Lorenzo throne.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep35
programme.desc: Fast Food Lemur Nation - Tired of waiting so long for his meals, King Julien introduces “fast food” to the kingdom, but the side effects are not what he expected.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep35
programme.desc: Hitting The Sky Note / Hug Fest - When Poppy discovers that Sky Toronto doesn’t sing, she sets out to convince him that singing is the greatest joy in the world./Poppy shows Branch around his first Hug Fest, a Troll festival to celebrate hugs.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep35
programme.desc: Eggs - Ton-Ton and the Trux must protect a cluster of fragile Ankylodump eggs from the Scraptors after an earthquake separates them from their herd

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep9
programme.desc: Home Alone - Aggro, Burple and Cutter are left alone in the roost to care for some dragon eggs, but a trio of tricky Slinkwings want those eggs for themselves.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep17
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Runaway Bath - Pat must deliver an old bath tub to Pencaster Lighthouse. But when he goes to collect it from Thompson Ground, the bath ends up rolling away into Greendale with Jess inside! When Pat catches up with the bath he finds PC Selby about to impound it for being an un-road-worthy vehicle. Pat explains it's a Special Delivery and at last gets on his way. But when he arrives in Pencaster Bay, Micawber and Jess between them manage to loosen the rope tying up the SDS Boat and it goes chugging off to sea with no one on board! So Pat and Jess use the bath as a boat and paddle out to rescue the boat then at last deliver the old bath to Chris. SDS Mission accomplished - mioaw!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep18
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Loch Ness Monster - Mrs Goggins is on holiday, so Sarah Gilbertson is looking after her dog Bonnie. She calls in on Pat and proves she has zero control over the dog. But there is only time for Jess to roll his eyes before Pat is called out on a special delivery - it's urgent! He has to deliver the RADARSCOPE (designed by Ted) to Mrs Goggins, who is up in Scotland! Pat has no idea what a radarscope is and neither does Ben. But they know what urgent means, so they spring into action and load it into Pat's jet plane. Back in Greendale Bonnie gives Sarah the slip, and PC Selby becomes embroiled in an escalating search... up in Scotland meanwhile, Pat lands but doesn't even get an explanation of the radarscope as time is pressing, and he, Jess, and their technological bit of kit are bundled into a boat and they set out over the loch... Loch Ness! While the search for mischievous Bonnie intensifies back home, Pat realizes they are searching for a creature of their own - the Loch Ness Monster!

programme.title: Olivia Ep19
programme.desc: Olivia Leads A Parade - As Mother tries to get baby William to sleep, Olivia, Ian and Julian create a backyard parade. When Francine finds out, she decides she's going to make her OWN parade. Olivia eventually sees that two parades can be better than one –and even figures out how to keep fussy William asleep.

programme.title: Olivia Ep20
programme.desc: Olivia Tends To The Sick - Julian comes down with a case of “itchyfootitis,” so it's Dr. Olivia to the rescue, with all kinds of silly treatments. When the “condition” begins to spread to others, Olivia imagines herself running an entire “itchy foot” clinic, and eventually discovers the perfect cure.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep17
programme.desc: Simply The Best - Molecom is very grateful to Plugger for rescuing him after yet another of Flash's pranks. But Plugger is soon frustrated by Molecom's attempts to help… Meanwhile, Roary is trying hard to beat his best lap time.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep18
programme.desc: Cici Wins The Day - Cici is fed up with never winning and decides not to take part in the race that day. Can Roary persuade her to change her mind?

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Ep9
programme.desc: Lights Camera Crackridge / Karaoke Dokey - Archibald scores a job as a movie star's stunt double. Loy starts to lose it after getting a disappointing score on Archibald's karaoke video game.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep36
programme.desc: Super Smash Siblings / A Hole In Grug - Eep and Thunk compete against their classmates in “Ahhh-Smashin”/After being denied a spot on the Valley's Wall of Fame, Grug creates a new game

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep35
programme.desc: Lucky And The Arabian Nightmares - When Al goes out of town, he puts the PALs in charge of the ramada, but they get more than they bargained for when three trouble-making horses escape

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep35
programme.desc: Foldin' Girls / V For Ven-Lotta - Dot faces off against Chevron in the North American Origami Gam Prix. Someone ruined Lotta's elaborate pasta sculpture -- and she wants payback.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep35
programme.desc: Maggotron/Love Hurts - Skid unleashes an evil robot on Turbotown and has to get rid of the monster himself; Turbo falls for and betroths a head-eating mantis princess.

programme.desc: Fast Food Lemur Nation - Tired of waiting so long for his meals, King Julien introduces “fast food” to the kingdom, but the side effects are not what he expected.

programme.desc: Uh-Oh, Canada - The Wanderers and Whitebeard visit Wizard Blizzardbeard in Quebec City, Canada, for the big Wanderers Ice Hockey Tournament. When Odlulu uses the Invisibility Key on herself and Fritz, they become an unstoppable, invisible hockey-playing duo. Wally and Wenda must pursue Odlulu on the rink and throughout Quebec City to retrieve the Invisibility Key.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep29
programme.desc: The Case Of The Silent Parrot - The Pirate Captain is very worried. Scurvy the parrot isn't saying a word. Without him navigating they won't be able to go treasure hunting anymore! Why is Scurvy so quiet? Is there something wrong? Or is he hiding something? It's up to Noddy to investigate!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep30
programme.desc: The Case Of The Vanished Ninjas - The Ninjas are preparing for an acrobatics show. But after Pat-Pat decorates them with glitter they don't turn up for their rehearsal. Noddy investigates, looking for the Ninjas, but only finds sticky things have gone missing round Toyland - Pat-Pat's glue-stick, the Naughticorns' sticky tape, the Builders' sticky putty. Noddy works out that the glitter made the Ninjas non sticky, so they borrowed sticky things to try and make themselves sticky again. Case closed!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep31
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Suitcase - Pat-Pat is packing for a sleepover at the Palace when her suitcase goes missing. Noddy follows the clues and discovers that the Pockets took the suitcase in order to get Pat-Pat's sleepy pillow. They wanted to keep the pillow because it reminds them of Pat-Pat and they would miss her while she was at the sleepover. Noddy finds the Pockets and the suitcase in the dark, just in time for the sleepover. Queen Sparklewings invites everyone to the sleepover. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep32
programme.desc: The Case Of The Two Parties - The Naughticorns are having a party and naturally they want everyone to come. Trouble is, so are the Pirates. But when no one turns up to either party, Noddy investigates: Why has no one come to either party?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep29
programme.desc: Hide And Toot - The animals are playing hide and seek. Huffty gets upset when his trunk keeps giving him away. Can Raa Raa and his friends show the little elephant that his trunk is really rather wonderful?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep30
programme.desc: Boing Boing - Raa Raa has got a new pogo stick. He is having a great time bouncing around, but his friends aren't so sure… he seems to be causing rather a lot of damage. Is there any way Raa Raa can practise without destroying their jungle home?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Rocky-Bye - Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep719
programme.desc: Pups Save Queen Cluck-Cluck / Pups Save a Desert Flounder - Mayor Goodway dreams she's travelled to the mysterious Cluck Cluck Island-a very strange land where Chickaletta is royalty! // Travelling Travis's balloon gets caught on the Flounder, Travis and Cap'n Turbot wind up all the way out into the desert.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Paddington & The Tooth Fairy / Paddington Goes to Work - Judy loses a tooth quite literally- Will it be found in time for bed and will the tooth fairy like marmalade? // Paddington becomes a work bear and helps Mr. Brown in the home office but learns computers can be tricky things.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Shake, Rattle and Bang - Madame Gazelle gives the class a music lesson. There's lots of crashing and banging at first, but it's not long before the grown-ups visit and lay down some notes of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep414
programme.desc: The Secret Club - Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club – going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Hospital - Peppa and her playgroup friends go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony, who is in hospital with a broken leg.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Emily Elephant - There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Best Friend - Peppa Pig's best friend, Suzy Sheep, comes over to visit.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep248
programme.desc: Bouncy Ball - Peppa and George are playing in the garden with their bouncy ball when Suzy Sheep turns up with two tennis rackets. She uses the bouncy ball to play a game of tennis with Peppa, making George feel left out. Will the job of ball boy cheer him up?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep250
programme.desc: Daddy Pig's Birthday - Today is Daddy Pig's birthday, but he has to go to work. While he is away, Mummy Pig, Peppa and George prepare a special birthday surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep237
programme.desc: Rebecca Rabbit - Peppa and George are going to Rebecca Rabbit’s house today. It is a bit different to Peppa’s house; it is inside a hill, with tunnels instead of stairs. They enjoy playing rabbits and everyone is surprised when George discovers he likes carrots!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep521
programme.desc: The Pet Competition - Playgroup is having a pet competition and everyone has brought their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but it is so hard to choose the best pet...

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep224
programme.desc: The Balloon Ride - Peppa wins the top prize in a raffle at school: a trip in a hot air balloon. Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, George and Peppa climb aboard and enjoy the flight until the balloon gets caught in a tree. Luckily, the balloon has landed in a very familiar garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep136
programme.desc: Sleepy Princess - Daddy Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a princess who needs sleep. In the story, Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mummy Pig is the queen, and Daddy Pig is the king.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep128
programme.desc: My Cousin Chloé - Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep138
programme.desc: Fancy Dress Party - Peppa and George are having a costume party. Peppa is a fairy princess, and George is a dinosaur. Peppa has to pick which of her friends is wearing the best costume.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Jumble Sale - Peppa’s playgroup is holding a jumble sale to raise money for a new roof and Madame Gazelle asks everyone to bring something to sell. Peppa and her friends bring in an old toy but they soon realise that favourite toys can be hard to let go of.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep516
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Dinosaur Park - To celebrate Freddy Fox's birthday, the children go on a trip to a Dinosaur Park. With Grampy Rabbit as their leader, they follow dinosaur footprints to find Freddy's birthday treat.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep213
programme.desc: The Time Capsule - Peppa and her school friends are making a time capsule. They each put one of their favourite things inside and bury it in the school garden. The children discover that their parents made a time capsule many years ago.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Not Very Well - Peppa has chicken pox, and has to stay in bed until she gets better.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Teddy's Day Out - Peppa and her family are having a picnic. Mr Zebra the Postman and Zoë Zebra are having a picnic too, so they decide to have one big picnic. When it’s home time, Peppa leaves her teddy behind.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep220
programme.desc: George's Birthday - Today is George’s birthday and Mummy and Daddy Pig have a special day planned. George gets a new Brontosaurus toy and the family go to the museum to see lots of different dinosaurs.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Coach Grandma / Busy Baby - Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods. // Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Satellite flight / Diamond geezer - Everyone is grooving to Stu and Safia's dance song, so the Deer has to stop Steel's satellite from broadcasting hypnotic dance signals. // To impress Lady Fluffpot, Sir Steel tries to get his hands on Jade's precious Rainbow Diamond!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Paddingtons New Neighbour / Paddington Makes the News - The Browns have new neighbors & Toq is full of tales like there's a goblin in the garden and her dad is an astronaut! They can't be true, can they? // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy decide to create a newspaper but they need a front page story!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Paddington's Beach Stowaway - The Browns come back from a beach trip with more than sand in their hair - why is that shell moving on its own?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep609
programme.desc: The Great Pizza Race - It's a head-to-head showdown when Blaze and Crusher enter... The Great Pizza Race! Who will deliver all of their pizzas first and win the coveted Great Pizza Trophy?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Starla's Wild West Birthday - Starla's wild west birthday party is in trouble when her cake gets carried off by a runaway train. Can she, Blaze and AJ catch up and save the cake before it's too late?

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Deep Freeze / The Trojan Seahorse - The biggest party of the year could be cancelled after Escarlata la Pirata freezes the high seas! // Bonnie Bones is on the run with the museum's priceless treasures, but Santi and crew won't let her get far.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Flow Bros - When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep513
programme.desc: Super Baby! - When supervillain Lady Goo Goo starts changing everyone into babies, it's up to Guppy Girl and Bubble Boy to stop her before they get turned into babies too!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep514
programme.desc: The Mighty, Untidy Titans! - When some Untidy Titans (played by Guppies) start messing up Zooli, Nonny, and Oona's goat farm, the goat herders must journey to the Titan's cloud realm to ask them to tidy up.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep326
programme.desc: Digging Up the Road - Peppa and her family are trying to get to the playground, but Mr Bull's roadworks are in the way.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep401
programme.desc: Freddy Fox - Peppa and her friends are playing hide and seek, but it is Freddy Fox with his super smelling nose who is the best at playing that game.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Whistling - Peppa tries to learn how to whistle after she realizes that seemingly everyone but her can do it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Doctor Hamster's Tortoise - Doctor Hamster the vet comes to Peppa's playgroup to show the children her pets. But Tiddles has run away. But Ms. Rabbit is going to rescue Tiddles.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep169
programme.desc: The Key - Because of her fear of spiders, Froga locks herself and Ron in the greenhouse to collecting Strawberries for the friends' Strawberry Snack time Musical Feast. But when it is time to leave, she can't locate the key...

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep170
programme.desc: Fruits Surprise - When Froga and Christopher realize that Anna and Bubu may be making a "fruit surprises" for Snack Time, they try everything they can to preserve the two surprises. Froga and Christopher realized how difficult preserving a surprise can be!

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep117
programme.desc: The Big Bad Hen - Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Let Justice Be done / The Great Spring Clean - Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep303
programme.desc: No Time Like The Present Store - At the Present Store, Joe's running a contest, whoever guesses the mystery present gets to unwrap it! What could be inside this special gift?! We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Fast Friends - Blaze, AJ, and Gabby meet a brand new monster machine named Watts - a super fast truck with electric tires! But when one of her special tires goes rolling into the jungle, Blaze, AJ, and Gabby promise to help her get it back.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep604
programme.desc: Pups Save the Honey / Pups Save Mayor Goodway's Purse - Yumi's Yummy Honey is all the buzz when it - and her beehive - go missing from her farm! // Mayor Goodway's purse has disappeared! Along with its precious cargo - Chickaletta!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep420
programme.desc: Pups Save the Mail / Pups Save a Frog Mayor - The postman's truck gets stuck in the mud and the mail gets stuck in a tree. // Mayor Goodway turns into a frog.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Treasure Park/Baddy Long Legs - When Bobbi and Jade find an underground cavern, they end up in danger when Sir Steel goes treasure hunting! // Rammy is so focused on meditation that he fails to focus on a REAL crisis!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Forever Young - The Deer Squad must help the city's residents when they break out in spots thanks to Sir Steel's new face cream.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Paddington Opens the City Farm / Paddington the Upcycler - Paddington's excited about the grand opening of the city farm, but the animals escape when the gate is left open - will they find them in time? // Baaz teaches Jonathan & Paddington about upcycling but can the pair create something to earn a reward.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Paddington's Lucky Day / Paddington the Pizza Chef - Paddington Jonathan & Judy are worried they've used up all of Lucky the dog's luck - how will they tell Sofia? // Baaz's niece Simi is visiting & he wants to create the perfect pizza to surprise her with but it's not easy with hungry animals around!

programme.desc: Royal Rescue - A visit to the King's castle goes awry when the King accidentally catapults himself far, far away! To bring him home, Blaze, AJ and the King's adorable pet dragon Zeek must transform into knights in shining armor!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Shrunken Ships / The Pirate Parade - When Escarlata turns the crew tiny, they have to find a pint-sized way to save the day. // It's time for the annual Pirate Parade! That is, unless Escarlata has anything to say about it.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Rocky-Bye - Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep719
programme.desc: Pups Save Queen Cluck-Cluck / Pups Save a Desert Flounder - Mayor Goodway dreams she's travelled to the mysterious Cluck Cluck Island-a very strange land where Chickaletta is royalty! // Travelling Travis's balloon gets caught on the Flounder, Travis and Cap'n Turbot wind up all the way out into the desert.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Paddington & The Tooth Fairy / Paddington Goes to Work - Judy loses a tooth quite literally- Will it be found in time for bed and will the tooth fairy like marmalade? // Paddington becomes a work bear and helps Mr. Brown in the home office but learns computers can be tricky things.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Helicopter - Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and her family for a ride in her rescue helicopter.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep626
programme.desc: Snowy Mountain - Peppa and her friends are on Snowy Mountain learning how to ski. Their teacher, Madame Gazelle is very good at skiing and was once a world champion! But in the end it is Mummy Pig who impresses everyone...

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep625
programme.desc: The Olden Days - Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep old photographs from when they were babies. Peppa and Suzy don't remember being that young but are pleased to see that they've always been best friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep623
programme.desc: Peppa's Circus - Grandpa Pig has put up a tent in his garden. Peppa and her friends decide it's a perfect place to put on a circus. With Peppa as the ringmaster, the show can begin!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Work and Play - When Peppa and Suzy learn that grown ups must work all day, they decide to play at working in a store. But they quickly get tired of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep248
programme.desc: Bouncy Ball - Peppa and George are playing in the garden with their bouncy ball when Suzy Sheep turns up with two tennis rackets. She uses the bouncy ball to play a game of tennis with Peppa, making George feel left out. Will the job of ball boy cheer him up?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep521
programme.desc: The Pet Competition - Playgroup is having a pet competition and everyone has brought their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but it is so hard to choose the best pet...

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep246
programme.desc: The Quarrel - Peppa and Suzy Sheep are having a quarrel and decide they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Pedro the Cowboy - Pedro Pony pretends he is a proper cowboy, telling everyone stories in the camp he has set up in the garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep243
programme.desc: School Camp - Peppa and her friends are going camping with Madame Gazelle. When it gets dark, they all sing a song around the campfire. When it is time for bed, Peppa and her friends get a little scared and all the children end up sleeping in Madame Gazelle’s tent

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep508
programme.desc: International Day - Peppa and her friends at playgroup dress up in clothes from different countries all over the world, but then have an argument.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep241
programme.desc: Pen Pal - Peppa has a French pen pal, a girl donkey, named Delphine. They also speak to each other on the telephone. Although Peppa speaks English and Delphine speaks French, they discover that they love lots of the same things.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep240
programme.desc: Pretend Friend - Suzy Sheep has made up a pretend friend called “Leo Lion”. Peppa cannot see Leo but Suzy says that Leo likes roaring and dressing up. Peppa decides that now she can see Leo. Even Mummy and Daddy Pig play along. But George feels a bit left out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Rongisõit - Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep237
programme.desc: Rebecca Rabbit - Peppa and George are going to Rebecca Rabbit’s house today. It is a bit different to Peppa’s house; it is inside a hill, with tunnels instead of stairs. They enjoy playing rabbits and everyone is surprised when George discovers he likes carrots!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep505
programme.desc: Naughty Tortoise - Dr Hamster's pet tortoise Tiddles gets stuck up a tree - who is going to come to the rescue?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep236
programme.desc: School Bus Trip - Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her school friends on a school bus trip to the mountains. From the top of the mountains there is a fantastic view and Peppa and her friends have fun hearing echoes. After a great day out, the bus takes the children home

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Danny's Pirate Party - It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Granddad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep234
programme.desc: Dens - Peppa is playing in the tree-house with the girls, and George and the boys stay in the castle that Grandpa Pig built for them. But when it starts to rain and the garden is covered in muddy puddles, they rush out to play together!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep425
programme.desc: Edmond Elephant's Birthday - Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Snowball Bonanza / The Present - Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza against Carnivore Cove's neighboring town. // Baby Shark goes undercover to figure out the perfect gift for Mommy Shark.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Jump up & get down / What's up Lola - It's Deer Squad to the rescue when Stu and Safia bounce off to space on their super bouncy mega trampolines./ A bad mood crystal causes Lola and many animals to become unusually grumpy!Jade has to help Deer Squad to restore joy around Central Forest.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Paddington's Hatching Surprise / Paddington the Best Bear - Paddington helps to hatch an egg, but it takes ages and when it finally cracks open he gets a real surprise! // Paddington wishes he could have been at Mr. and Mrs. Brown's wedding after seeing some photos, so they decide to do it all again!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Paddington and the Big Decision - On the last day of the school holidays Jonathan & Judy can't agree on what to do so Paddington has the casting vote.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep611
programme.desc: Firefighters to the Rescue! - When three fire emergencies break out across Axle City, it's up to Blaze to put 'em out - and to do it, he'll transform into the most epic fire rescue vehicles we've ever seen!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep612
programme.desc: Big Rig: Dolphin Delivery - When a dolphin named Flippy needs help getting back to his family in the ocean, there's only one monster machine with enough power to get the job done: Big Rig Blaze!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Curse of the Gold Falcon / The Island of Lost Things - Santiago and crew set sail to return the Golden Falcon idol back to it's rightful resting place. // When Santiago's magic sword is transported to the Island of Lost Things, the good pirates have to track it down by getting themselves lost!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: A Shark Day's Night - The Tentacools (Baby, William, and Vola) get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep516
programme.desc: It's a Lizard! - When showman Gil's "real live dragon" (actually a Komodo Dragon) gets loose in the small town of Bubbleville, it's up to Pet Finders Oona and Zooli to track the lizard down and return it to its home on Komodo Island.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep614
programme.desc: Search for the Great Gorilla! - When Primatologists Zooli and Gil searching the rainforest for a Silverback Gorilla, they're chased into an ancient temple by a robotic silverback... who turns out to just be a tiny marmoset guarding a sanctuary of mountain gorillas!

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep99
programme.desc: Running Around in Circles - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po run around in circles in Home Dome. The Noo-Noo joins in and the Teletubbies have fun chasing.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S2) Ep4
programme.desc: Bee - Dee encourages a friend to say 'bee' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different bees. There are stripy bees, buzzy bees, and yellow, black and fuzzy bees.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep41
programme.desc: Scrub-A-Dub-Pup - Granny Po loves her puppy, but her puppy loves lying in a muddy flowerbed. Can the team help her out of this muddle?

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) Ep16
programme.desc: It's time to build a sandcastle - JoJo & Gran Gran go on a day-trip to the seaside to build a big sandcastle for Panda. But JoJo learns that things need not last forever to be special!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep71
programme.desc: Honestly, Monty - Monty becomes nervous when he breaks Jeanie's project and doesn't know whether to tell her. He soon learns that you should always be honest.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep70
programme.desc: Jimmy Jones Rules - Monty tries to tell his family that Jimmy is not just a toy, but much more. Whether they believe him is another story.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep12
programme.desc: Sticky Gecko - Mum must get Bluey and Bingo out the door in time for a playdate, but they can't leave before they finish their game - waiting for a sticky rubber gecko to drop from the ceiling.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep34
programme.desc: The Circus Badge - The Squirrels are excited that a circus has come to town, until they see it is a flea circus. However, they realise it is impressive when they see the acts.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep33
programme.desc: The Tidy Up Badge - A big package arrives for Duggee while he is dusting - an amazing new vacuum cleaner.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep32
programme.desc: The Decorating Badge - The dog is painting the clubhouse and the squirrels ask if they can help, but they have some different colours in mind.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Stonehenge, England - The Go Jetters set out to stop Glitch playing dominoes with the ancient stones of Stonehenge.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: The Pyramids of Giza, Egypt - Glitch creates trouble with a little pyramid when he and the Go Jetters visit the Pyramids of Giza in Egypt.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep11
programme.desc: Charades - Bluey and Bingo want everyone to play charades, but Muffin and Socks are too young to understand the rules and Nana must think quickly to keep the game on track.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep10
programme.desc: Rug Island - On Bingo and Bluey's Rug Island, a pack of felt pens can be anything: bananas, campfires, even a snake. But Dad will need to embrace his inner kid if he wants to make it his home.

programme.title: Andy's Dinosaur Adventures (S1) Ep9
programme.desc: Coelophysis and Fish - When Taffy runs off with Hatty's fish, Andy travels back in time and discovers that the coelophysis is much better at catching fish than he is.

programme.title: My Pet and Me: Teeny Tiny Creatures (S2) Ep4
programme.desc: Honeybees - Rory and Sandy are looking for honeybees, and Chantelle has a special view of a hive. Find out how honeybees help the planet and try this Teeny Tiny Task: make a wildflower seed ball!

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S5) Ep6
programme.desc: Bad Loser - Captain Captain is in her usual competitive mood, and she is determined not to lose any of the jewels today.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep31
programme.desc: The Snowman Badge - The Squirrels are playing outside in the snow and decide to build a jolly-looking snowman. But when the punky penguins turn up, the fun REALLY begins!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep30
programme.desc: The We Love Animals Badge - Duggee is stroking Enid the cat. The Squirrels want to find animals they can stroke too.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep29
programme.desc: The Spider Badge - The squirrels are playing in the clubhouse when Norrie discovers a spider in the dressing up box. Everywhere Norrie goes the spider seems to go too. Aarrrggh! That's a bit scary!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: The Eiffel Tower, France - Four adventure-seeking superheroes explore places all around the world. The Go Jetters try to fix the Eiffel tower after Grandmaster Glitch breaks it while using it as a TV aerial.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep50
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Birthday Surprise - The Go Jetters plan a surprise birthday party for Ubercorn!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S15) Ep16
programme.desc: Kevin The Steamie - When Kevin is left in charge of the steamworks, he decides to use the space to practice his shunting skills - with disasterous results.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep34
programme.desc: Brolly Bus - When Umbrella gets left on the bus, Sarah and Duck head to the bus depot in search of their friend.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep33
programme.desc: Whatsathingy - Sarah & Duck try to work out exactly what it is that Scarf Lady has been busily knitting in her sleep.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep26
programme.desc: Cooking Up a Storm - Nelly and Nora have to get everything indoors before the big storm arrives.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) Ep34
programme.desc: Dog Loves Camping - Dog and Pug decide to go holiday and use Granny Pug's guide to camping. They visit a music festival, a jungle and they go to the top of a mountain.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep69
programme.desc: Waiting Games - When Gran tells Monty that good things come to those who wait, he wonders how it could possibly be better to wait for something than to have it right away.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep13
programme.desc: The Thing That Was Funny - Bob really wants to see his funny face, so the gang go on the hunt for a dinopaw called OtherBob.

programme.desc: The Tinsel Badge - It's nearly Christmas, so while Duggee wraps presents to go under the tree he asks the Squirrels if they want to decorate the clubhouse.

programme.desc: Beverley O'Connor presents the week's main international news, as reported by ABC News correspondents deployed in Bangkok, Beirut, Istanbul, Jakarta, Jerusalem, London, New Delhi, Port Moresby, Taipei, Tokyo and Washington.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep14
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's top stories. Plus reporters investigating the issues that matter. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 10 - Retirees and childhood sweethearts Liz and Warren have taken on a hundred-acre Macadamia farm in the Byron Bay hinterland, with grand plans to build an epic five-bedroom Mediterranean style villa-come-castle.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 34 - Costa meets a frog fanatic; Sophie talks garden ties; Jerry whacks weeds; Jane tours an inclined garden; Hannah harnesses chook power; Clarence discovers the power of plants; we meet an artist inspired by plants and play.

programme.title: Dream Gardens Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Two years ago, a couple had their son and daughter-in-law transform their bland backyard into a striking, sculptural retreat. Michael McCoy returns to see if the unique garden was worth the gamble.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent Ep1
programme.desc: After decades of peace, Japan is now confronting the possibility of war. With concerns over a resurgent Russia, North Korea and a more powerful China, Japan is embarking on its biggest military spend since WWII. (Return)

programme.title: Four Corners Ep3
programme.desc: Can carbon credits really save the planet? We journey deep into the Papua New Guinean jungle to uncover the confronting truth about the carbon trade, finding a vast chasm between what is marketed and what is really happening.

programme.title: Media Watch Ep3
programme.desc: Rate rise rumble; Lehrmann sues; Crypto coma; Google's bad Bard.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep5
programme.desc: Beverley O'Connor presents the week's main international news, as reported by ABC News correspondents deployed in Bangkok, Beirut, Istanbul, Jakarta, Jerusalem, London, New Delhi, Port Moresby, Taipei, Tokyo and Washington.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep14
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch Ep2
programme.desc: Join Michael Rowland, Lisa Millar, Tony Armstrong, Madeleine Morris and Nate Byrne for some of the best conversations as we hear from some of the most informed and entertaining guests who have appeared on News Breakfast.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep3
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: Landline Ep1
programme.desc: A tasty sampler of stories from the land - covering food, agriculture, crops, climate, business and innovation - as we meet the fascinating people who make our rural and regional communities unique. Presented by Pip Courtney.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep3
programme.desc: With cost of living pressures increasing after nine consecutive interest rate rises, there's never been a more important time to keep track of your money. Rachel Pupazzoni looks at the week in business, finance and markets.

programme.title: UFC 284: Makhachev vs. Volkanovski
programme.desc: Main Event - When the Octagon returns to Australia on February 12, a SuperFight will be on tap for the UFC 284 mainevent at RAC Arena in Perth, as newly-crowned lightweight champion Islam Makhachev defends his title for the first time against the undisputed eatherweight champion, Australia’s own Alexander Volkanovski. Looking to join the exclusive list of double-champs in UFC history, Volkanovski enters his first fight on home soil since 2018 on the heels of a dominant 145-pound reign that includes four successful title defenses over the likes of Max Holloway, Brian Ortega and Chan Sung Jung. But in February, he will be put to the test by Dagestan’s Makhachev, a dominant presence in his own right who extended his current winning streak to 11 in October when he submitted Charles Oliveira in the second round to win the 155-pound championship he will defend against Alexander “The Great”. Plus, the interim featherweight title will be on the line in the co-main event when top contenders Yair Rodriguez and Josh Emmett collide in what promises to an explosive five-round championship bout, and former world champion Robert Whittaker faces Paulo Cos

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: Champs Only - UFC Unleashed features the best fights from the UFC archives, all in one show. Unleashed brings you the big fights that you missed or want to see all over again.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep8
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep8
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep8
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback
programme.desc: UFC Fight Flashback 1005: Usman vs. Edwards 2 - UFC 278 was headlined by a rematch between long reigning middleweight king Kamaru “The Nigerian Nightmare” Usman and UFC vet Leon “Rocky” Edwards. See their fight like never before with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2249
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: 2022 Pertamina Grand Prix of Indonesia Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The Indonesian motorcycle Grand Prix is a motorcycling event that is part of the Grand Prix motorcycle racing World Championship. There have been three Grand Prix events held; in 1996 and 1997, both at the Sentul International Circuit, Bogor, West Java, and in 2022 at the Mandalika International Street Circuit, Central Lombok, West Nusa Tenggara.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2249
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

Looking to join the exclusive list of double-champs in UFC history, Volkanovski enters his first fight on home soil since 2018 on the heels of a dominant 145-pound reign that includes four successful title defenses over the likes of Max Holloway, Brian Ortega and Chan Sung Jung. programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Lewis vs. Spivac
programme.desc: Prelims - After quietly working his way up the heavyweight ranks, Moldova’s Serghei Spivac smashed his way into the Top 15 with finishes of Greg Hardy and Augusto Sakai, and now the “Polar Bear” aims for even greater heights when he faces the UFC’s Knockout King, Derrick Lewis, in the main event of UFC Fight Night on February 5 at the APEX in Las Vegas. One of the best heavyweights of his era, Lewis has sent top prospects like Chris Daukaus and Curtis Blaydes crashing to defeat, and he has similar plans for Spivac in this pivotal showdown

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Lewis vs. Spivac

programme.title: UFC 284: Makhachev vs. Volkanovski
programme.desc: Prelims - When the Octagon returns to Australia on February 12, a SuperFight will be on tap for the UFC 284 mainevent at RAC Arena in Perth, as newly-crowned lightweight champion Islam Makhachev defends his title for the first time against the undisputed eatherweight champion, Australia’s own Alexander Volkanovski. Looking to join the exclusive list of double-champs in UFC history, Volkanovski enters his first fight on home soil since 2018 on the heels of a dominant 145-pound reign that includes four successful title defenses over the likes of Max Holloway, Brian Ortega and Chan Sung Jung. But in February, he will be put to the test by Dagestan’s Makhachev, a dominant presence in his own right who extended his current winning streak to 11 in October when he submitted Charles Oliveira in the second round to win the 155-pound championship he will defend against Alexander “The Great”. Plus, the interim featherweight title will be on the line in the co-main event when top contenders Yair Rodriguez and Josh Emmett collide in what promises to an explosive five-round championship bout, and former world champion Robert Whittaker faces Paulo Cos

programme.title: UFC 284: Makhachev vs. Volkanovski
